SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.deck

Class ObjectiveDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.deck.ObjectiveDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameSubject
public class ObjectiveDeck extends Object implements GameSubject
The objective deck is composed of 16 objective cards at the start of the game which are then distributed as follows:
- 2 cards are revealed on the ground;
- 1 card is drawn from the deck by each player.

    • getCard

      public ObjectiveCard getCard()
      This method should be called once at the start of the match by each player
      Returns:
      the first card of the deck

    • peekTop

      public ObjectiveCard peekTop()
      Returns the top card of the face-down pile of the deck.
      Returns:
      face-down pile top card

    • reveal

      public void reveal()
      This method should be called once per game during setup. If called more than once it doesn't change the status of the deck.

    • getFirstRevealed

      public ObjectiveCard getFirstRevealed()
      Getter for the first revealed card. This card must be referred to in order to calculate the objective points.
      Returns:
      the first revealed objective card

      Returns:
      the second revealed objective card
